tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE delivery_delays (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id INT,
  delay_reason TEXT,
  delay_duration INT,
  logged_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DeliveryDelays (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  delay_reason VARCHAR(255),
  delay_duration INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES SupplierLeadTimes(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeliveryDelays (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    delay_minutes INT NOT NULL,
    reported_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    cause VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionDelays (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    delay_reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    delay_start_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    delay_end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE DeliveryDelays (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    delay_days INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES SupplierLeadTimes(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionDelays (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    delay_days INT,
    production_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES SupplierLeadTimes(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplierLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_address VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES SupplierLeadTimes(supplier_id)
);
